oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Felix Grundy portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Felix Grundy (1777-1840). Portrait is from the waist up. Grundy is sitting with a paper in his left hand. He wears a black coat with light vest and white collar and tie.
Criminal lawyer in Kentucky and Tennessee; Chief Justice of the U.S. Supreme Court; U.S. Representative and Senator from Tennessee,1811-1814, 1829-1838. Leading War Hawk during the War of 1812.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Grundy, Felix, 1777-1840
